unnormalised: Hey, solar rooftop subsidies are awesome, right? My cousin Priya in Bangalore got one last year. Heard it slashed her electricity bill by like, Rs. 2000 a month! Now she can afford more Onam sadhya every year. Wonder if they have something similar in Delhi where I live. Heard good things about the MNRE scheme. Anyone know how long the approval process takes? Maybe I'll finally go green!
normalised: Hey, solar rooftop subsidies are awesome, right? My cousin Priya in Bangalore got one last year. Heard it slashed her electricity bill by like, rupee two thousand a month! Now she can afford more Onam sadhya every year. Wonder if they have something similar in Delhi where I live. Heard good things about the M N R E scheme. Anyone know how long the approval process takes? Maybe I'll finally go green!
